    "type": "Reading",
    "topic": "Nature & Environment",
    "questionType": "Matching Headings",
    "title": "White mountain, green tourism",
    "paragraph": "<div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px 5px; border-top: 3px solid rgb(255, 165, 0); color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><div style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px 5px; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><h3 style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.1; color: inherit; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px;   font-size: 20px;\">White mountain, green tourism</h3></div><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><em style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">The French Alpine town of Chamonix has been a magnet for tourists since the&nbsp;</span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">18</span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">th century. But today, tourism and climate change are putting pressure on the surrounding environment. Marc Grainger reports.</span></em></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">A</strong></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">The town of Chamonix-Mont-Blanc sits in a valley at 1,035 metres above sea level in the Haute-Savoie department in south-eastern France. To the north&shy;west are the red peaks of the Aiguilles Rouges&nbsp;</span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">massif;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">to the south-east are the permanently white peaks of Mont Blanc, which at 4,810 metres is the highest mountain in the Alps. It&rsquo;s a typical Alpine environment, but one that is under increasing strain from the hustle and bustle of human activity.</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">B</strong></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Tourism is Chamonix&rsquo;s lifeblood. Visitors have been encouraged to visit the valley ever since it was discovered by explorers in 1741. Over 40 years later, in 1786,</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Mont Blanc&rsquo;s summit was finally reached by a French doctor and his guide, and this gave birth to the sport of alpinism, with Chamonix at its centre. In 1924, it hosted the first Winter Olympics, and the cable cars and lifts that were built in the years that followed gave everyone access to the ski slopes.</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">C</strong></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Today, Chamonix is a modern town, connected to the outside world via the Mont Blanc Road Tunnel and a busy highway network. It receives up to 60,000 visitors at a time during the ski season, and climbers, hikers and extreme-sports enthusiasts swarm there in the summer in even greater numbers, swelling the town&rsquo;s population to 100,000. It is the third most visited natural site in the world, according to Chamonix&rsquo;s Tourism Office and, last year, it had 5.2 million visitor bed nights - all this in a town with fewer than 10,000 permanent inhabitants.</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">D</strong></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">This influx of tourists has put the local environment under severe pressure, and the authorities in the valley have decided to take action. Educating visitors is vital. Tourists are warned not to drop rubbish, and there are now recycling points dotted all around the valley, from the town centre to halfway up the mountains. An internet blog reports environmental news in the town, and the &lsquo;green&rsquo; message is delivered with all the tourist office&rsquo;s activities.</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">E</strong></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Low-carbon initiatives are also important for the region. France is committed to reducing its carbon emissions by a factor of four by 2050. Central to achieving this aim is a strategy that encourages communities to identify their carbon emissions on a local level and make plans to reduce them. Studies have identified that accommodation accounts for half of all carbon&nbsp;</span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">emissions in the Chamonix valley. Hotels are known to be inefficient operations, but those around Chamonix are now cleaning up their act. Some are using low-energy lighting, restricting water use and making recycling bins available for guests; others have invested in huge projects such as furnishing and decorating using locally sourced materials, using geothermal energy for heating and installing solar panels.</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">F</strong></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Chamonix&rsquo;s council is encouraging the use of renewable energy in private properties too, by making funds available for green renovations and new constructions. At the same time, public- sector buildings have also undergone improvements to make them more energy efficient and less wasteful. For example, the local ice rink has reduced its annual water consumption from 140,000 cubic metres to 10,000 cubic metres in the space of three years.</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">G</strong></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Improving public transport is another feature of the new policy, as 80 percent of carbon&nbsp;</span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">emissions from transport used to come from private vehicles. While the Mont Blanc Express is an ideal way to travel within the valley - and see some incredible scenery along the route - it is much more difficult to arrive in Chamonix from outside by rail. There is no direct line from the closest airport in Geneva, so tourists arriving by air normally transfer by car or bus. However, at a cost of 3.3 million euros a year, Chamonix has introduced a free shuttle service in order to get people out of their cars and into buses fitted with particle filters.</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">H</strong></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">If the valley&rsquo;s visitors and residents want to know why they need to reduce their environmental impact, they just have to look up; the effects of climate change are there for everyone to see in the melting glaciers that cling to the mountains. The fragility of the Alpine environment has long been a concern among local people. Today, 70 percent of the 805 square kilometres that comprise Chamonix-Mont-Blanc is protected in some way. But now, the impact of tourism has led the authorities to recognise that more must be done if the valley is to remain prosperous: that they must not only protect the natural environment better, but also manage the numbers of visitors better, so that its</span></p></div></div></div></div><div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px 5px; border-top: 3px solid rgb(255, 165, 0); color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><br></div></div></div>",
    "question": "<div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px 5px; border-top: 3px solid rgb(255, 165, 0); color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; padding: 0px 5px; border-top: 3px solid rgb(255, 165, 0); color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; font-weight: 400;\">Choose <strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);\">TWO</span></strong> letters, <strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">D</b></span>&nbsp;<input type=\"checkbox\" name=\"q8\" value=\"D\" disabled=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; Answer: D OR E IN EITHER ORDER</span><br style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: bold; color: red;\">9. Answer: D OR E IN EITHER ORDER</span></span></p></div><div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px 5px; border-top: 3px solid rgb(255, 165, 0); color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-weight: 400;\">Public areas, such as the&nbsp;<input type=\"text\" required=\"\" readonly=\"\" value=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit;\"> in Chamonix, are using fewer resources.<br style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: bold; color: red;\">Answer: ice rink</span></span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">13</strong>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;The&nbsp;<input type=\"text\" required=\"\" readonly=\"\" value=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit;\"></span> <span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">on the mountains around Chamonix provide visual evidence of global warming.<br style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: bold; color: red;\">Answer: glaciers</span></span></p></div></div></div><div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px 5px; border-top: 3px solid rgb(255, 165, 0); color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><div style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><br></div></div>",
    "answerLocation": "<div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><h3 style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.1; color: inherit; margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px;   font-size: 20px;\">White mountain, green tourism</h3></div><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><em style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">The French Alpine town of Chamonix has been a magnet for tourists since the 18th century. But today, tourism and climate change are putting pressure on the surrounding environment. Marc Grainger reports.</em></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">A</strong></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">The town of Chamonix-Mont-Blanc sits in a valley&nbsp;<span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(255, 227, 21); color: rgb(34, 34, 34); border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(226, 181, 15); padding-right: 5px;\">at 1,035 metres above sea level in the Haute-Savoie department in south-eastern France</span>. To the north&shy;west are the red peaks of the Aiguilles Rouges&nbsp;</span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">massif;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">to the south-east are the permanently white peaks of Mont Blanc, which at 4,810 metres is the highest mountain in the Alps. It&rsquo;s a typical Alpine environment, but one that is under increasing strain from the hustle and bustle of human activity.</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">B</strong></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Tourism is Chamonix&rsquo;s lifeblood. Visitors have been encouraged to visit the valley ever since it was discovered by&nbsp;<span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(255, 227, 21); color: rgb(34, 34, 34); border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(226, 181, 15); padding-right: 5px;\">explorers</span> in 1741. Over 40 years later, in 1786,</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Mont Blanc&rsquo;s summit was finally reached by a French doctor and his guide, and this gave birth to the sport of alpinism, with Chamonix at its centre. In 1924, it hosted the first Winter Olympics, and the cable cars and lifts that were built in the years that followed gave everyone access to the ski slopes.</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">C</strong></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Today, Chamonix is a modern town, connected to the outside world via the Mont Blanc Road Tunnel and a busy highway network. It receives up to 60,000 visitors at a time during the ski season, and&nbsp;<span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(255, 227, 21); color: rgb(34, 34, 34); border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(226, 181, 15); padding-right: 5px;\">climbers, hikers and extreme-sports enthusiasts</span> swarm there in the&nbsp;<span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(255, 227, 21); color: rgb(34, 34, 34); border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(226, 181, 15); padding-right: 5px;\">summer</span> in even greater numbers, swelling the town&rsquo;s population to 100,000. It is the third most visited natural site in the world, according to Chamonix&rsquo;s Tourism Office and, last year, it had 5.2 million visitor bed nights - all this in a town with fewer than 10,000 permanent inhabitants.</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">D</strong></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">This influx of tourists has put the local environment under severe pressure, and the authorities in the valley have decided to take action. Educating visitors is vital. Tourists are warned not to drop rubbish, and there are now recycling points dotted all around the valley, from the town centre to halfway up the mountains. An internet blog reports environmental news in the town, and the &lsquo;green&rsquo; message is delivered with all the tourist office&rsquo;s activities.</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">E</strong></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Low-carbon initiatives are also important for the region.&nbsp;<span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(255, 227, 21); color: rgb(34, 34, 34); border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(226, 181, 15); padding-right: 5px;\">France is committed to reducing its carbon emissions by a factor of four by 2050</span>. Central to achieving this aim is a strategy that encourages communities to identify their carbon emissions on a local level and make plans to reduce them. Studies have identified that accommodation accounts for half of all carbon&nbsp;</span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">emissions in the Chamonix valley. Hotels are known to be inefficient operations, but those around Chamonix are now cleaning up their act. Some are using low-energy lighting, restricting water use and making recycling bins available for guests; others have invested in huge projects such as furnishing and decorating using locally sourced materials, using geothermal energy for heating and installing solar panels.</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">F</strong></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Chamonix&rsquo;s council is encouraging the use of renewable energy in private properties too, by making funds available for green renovations and new constructions. At the same time, public- sector buildings have also undergone improvements to make them more energy efficient and less wasteful. For example, the local&nbsp;<span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(255, 227, 21); color: rgb(34, 34, 34); border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(226, 181, 15); padding-right: 5px;\">ice rink</span> has reduced its annual water consumption from 140,000 cubic metres to 10,000 cubic metres in the space of three years.</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">G</strong></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Improving public transport is another feature of the new policy, as 80 percent of carbon&nbsp;</span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">emissions from transport used to come from private vehicles. While the Mont Blanc Express is an ideal way to travel within the valley - and see some incredible scenery along the route - it is much more difficult to arrive in Chamonix from outside by rail. There is no direct line from the closest airport in Geneva, so tourists arriving by air normally transfer by car or bus. However, at a cost of 3.3 million euros a year, Chamonix has introduced&nbsp;<span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(255, 227, 21); color: rgb(34, 34, 34); border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(226, 181, 15); padding-right: 5px;\">a free shuttle service</span> in order to get people out of their cars and into buses fitted with particle filters.</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">H</strong></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">If the valley&rsquo;s visitors and residents want to know why they need to reduce their environmental impact, they just have to look up; the effects of climate change are there for everyone to see in the&nbsp;<span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(255, 227, 21); color: rgb(34, 34, 34); border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(226, 181, 15); padding-right: 5px;\">melting glaciers&nbsp;</span>that cling to the mountains. The fragility of the Alpine environment has long been a concern among local people. Today, 70 percent of the 805 square kilometres that comprise Chamonix-Mont-Blanc is protected in some way. But now, the impact of tourism has led the authorities to recognise that more must be done if the valley is to remain prosperous: that they must not only protect the natural environment better,&nbsp;<span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(255, 227, 21); color: rgb(34, 34, 34); border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(226, 181, 15); padding-right: 5px;\">but also manage the numbers of visitors better</span>, so that its residents can happily remain there.</span></p>",
    "extra": ""
  },
  {
    "type": "Reading",
    "topic": "News",
    "questionType": "Matching Headings",
    "title": "In Praise of Amateurs",
    "paragraph": "<div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; text-align: center; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><h3 style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.1; color: inherit; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px;   font-size: 20px;\">In Praise of Amateurs</h3></div><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\">Despite the specialization of scientific research, amateurs still have an important role to play.</p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\">During the scientific revolution of the 17th century, scientists were largely men of private means who pursued their interest in natural philosophy for their own edification. Only in the past century or two has it become possible to make a living from investigating the workings of nature. Modern science was, in other words, built on the work of amateurs. Today, science is an increasingly specialized and compartmentalized subject, the domain of experts who know more and more about less and less. Perhaps surprisingly, however, amateurs &ndash; even those without private means &ndash; are still important.</p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\">A recent poll carried out at a meeting of the American Association for the Advancement of Science by astronomer Dr Richard Fienberg found that, in addition to his field of astronomy, amateurs are actively involved in such field as acoustics, horticulture, ornithology, meteorology, hydrology and palaeontology. Far from being crackpots, amateur scientists are often in close touch with professionals, some of whom rely heavily on their co-operation.</p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\">Admittedly, some fields are more open to amateurs than others. Anything that requires expensive equipment is clearly a no-go area. And some kinds of research can be dangerous; most amateur chemists, jokes Dr Fienberg, are either locked up or have blown themselves to bits. But amateurs can make valuable contributions in fields from rocketry to palaeontology and the rise of the Internet has made it easier than before to collect data and distribute results.</p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\">Exactly which field of study has benefited most from the contributions of amateurs is a matter of some dispute. Dr Fienberg makes a strong case for astronomy. There is, he points out, a long tradition of collaboration between amateur and professional sky watchers. Numerous comets, asteroids and even the planet Uranus were discovered by amateurs. Today, in addition to comet and asteroid spotting, amateurs continue to do valuable work observing the brightness of variable stars and detecting novae- &lsquo;new&rsquo; stars in the Milky Way and supernovae in other galaxies. Amateur observers are helpful, says Dr Fienberg, because there are so many of them (they far outnumber professionals) and because they are distributed all over the world. This makes special kinds of observations possible:&rsquo; if several observers around the world accurately record the time when a star is eclipsed by an asteroid, for example, it is possible to derive useful information about the asteroid&rsquo;s shape.</p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\">Another field in which amateurs have traditionally played an important role is palaeontology. Adrian Hunt, a palaeontologist at Mesa Technical College in New Mexico, insists that his is the field in which amateurs have made the biggest contribution. Despite the development of high-tech equipment, he says, the best sensors for finding fossils are human eyes &ndash; lots of them.</p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\">Finding volunteers to look for fossils is not difficult, he says, because of the near universal interest in anything to do with dinosaurs. As well as helping with this research, volunteers learn about science, a process he calls &lsquo;recreational education&rsquo;.</p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\">Rick Bonney of the Cornell Laboratory of Ornithology in Ithaca, New York, contends that amateurs have contributed the most in his field. There are, he notes, thought to be as many as 60 million birdwatchers in America alone. Given their huge numbers and the wide geographical coverage they provide, Mr Bonney has enlisted thousands of amateurs in a number of research projects. Over the past few years their observations have uncovered previously unknown trends and cycles in bird migrations and revealed declines in the breeding populations of several species of migratory birds, prompting a habitat conservation programme.</p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\">Despite the successes and whatever the field of study, collaboration between amateurs and professionals is not without its difficulties. Not everyone, for example is happy with the term &lsquo;amateur&rsquo;. Mr Bonney has coined the term &lsquo;citizen scientist&rsquo; because he felt that other words, such as &lsquo;volunteer&rsquo; sounded disparaging. A more serious problem is the question of how professionals can best acknowledge the contributions made by amateurs. Dr Fienberg says that some amateur astronomers are happy to provide their observations but grumble about not being reimbursed for out-of-pocket expenses. Others feel let down when their observations are used in scientific papers, but they are not listed as co-authors. Dr Hunt says some amateur palaeontologists are disappointed when told that they cannot take finds home with them.</p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\">These are legitimate concerns but none seems insurmountable. Provided amateurs and professionals agree the terms on which they will work together beforehand, there is no reason why co-operation between the two groups should not flourish. Last year Dr S. Carlson, founder of the Society for Amateur Scientists won an award worth $290,000 for his work in promoting such co-operation. He says that one of the main benefits of the prize is the endorsement it has given to the contributions of amateur scientists, which has done much to silence critics among those professionals who believe science should remain their exclusive preserve.</p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\">At the moment, says Dr Carlson, the society is involved in several schemes including an innovative rocket-design project and the setting up of a network of observers who will search for evidence of a link between low- frequency radiation and earthquakes. The amateurs, he says, provide enthusiasm and talent, while the professionals provide guidance &lsquo;so that anything they do discover will be taken seriously&rsquo;. Having laid the foundations of science, amateurs will have much to contribute to its ever &ndash; expanding edifice.</p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\">-------------------------------</p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">Small Tip</strong>&nbsp;</span></p><ul style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><li style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Read</span><em style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">&nbsp;through the summary at&nbsp;<strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">normal&nbsp;speed</strong> so that you have a&nbsp;<strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">fair idea</strong> of what it is about.</span></em></li><li style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><em style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Check the instructions: you can use a&nbsp;<strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">maximum</strong> of two words for each answer and these words&nbsp;<strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">must be taken</strong> from the reading passage. If you use more than two words or words that are not in the passage, the answer will be marked wrong.</span></em></li><li style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><em style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">Skim</strong> the passage and find out where the part that has been&nbsp;<strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">summarised</strong> begins.</span></em></li><li style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><em style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Read the&nbsp;<strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">text</strong> around each gap carefully. See if you can&nbsp;<strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">predict</strong> the answer or the&nbsp;<strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">kind</strong> of word(s) that you are looking for.</span></em></li><li style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><em style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Select&nbsp;<strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">the best word</strong> from the text for each gap.</span></em></li><li style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\"><em style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">Re-read the summary</strong>, with the words you have selected for each gap, to make sure that it makes sense both&nbsp;<strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">grammatically</strong> and in terms of&nbsp;<strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">meaning</strong></em>.</span></li></ul>",
    "question": "<div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px 5px; border-top: 3px solid rgb(255, 165, 0); color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><div style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><h3 style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.1; color: inherit; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px;   font-size: 20px;\">Questions 1-8</h3><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\"><em style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Complete the summary below. Choose <span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">ONE or TWO WORDS</strong></span> from the passage for each answer.</span></em></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\"><em style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Write your answers in boxes <strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">1-8</strong> on your answer sheet.</span></em></p><div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; padding: 10px; border: 1px solid black;\"><h3 style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.1; color: inherit; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px;   font-size: 20px; text-align: center;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">Summary</strong></h3><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\">Prior to the 19th century, professional <b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">1&nbsp;</b><input type=\"text\" required=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); border-radius: 4px; width: 130px; background-color: rgb(255, 228, 225);\"> did not exist and scientific research was largely carried out by amateurs. However, while <b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">2&nbsp;</b><input type=\"text\" required=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); border-radius: 4px; width: 130px; background-color: rgb(255, 228, 225);\"> today is mostly the domain of professionals, a recent US survey highlighted the fact that amateurs play an important role in at least seven <b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">3&nbsp;</b><input type=\"text\" required=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); border-radius: 4px; width: 130px; background-color: rgb(255, 228, 225);\"> and indeed many professionals are reliant on their <b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">4&nbsp;</b><input type=\"text\" required=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); border-radius: 4px; width: 130px; background-color: rgb(255, 228, 225);\">. In areas such as astronomy, amateurs can be invaluable when making specific <b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">5&nbsp;</b><input type=\"text\" required=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); border-radius: 4px; width: 130px; background-color: rgb(255, 228, 225);\"> on a global basis. Similarly in the area of palaeontology their involvement is invaluable and helpers are easy to recruit because of the popularity of <b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">6&nbsp;</b><input type=\"text\" required=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); border-radius: 4px; width: 130px; background-color: rgb(255, 228, 225);\">. Amateur birdwatchers also play an active role and their work has led to the establishment of a <b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">7&nbsp;</b><input type=\"text\" required=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); border-radius: 4px; width: 130px; background-color: rgb(255, 228, 225);\">. Occasionally the term &#39;amateur&#39; has been the source of disagreement and alternative names have been suggested but generally speaking, as long as the professional scientists <b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">8&nbsp;</b><input type=\"text\" required=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit; border: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204); border-radius: 4px; width: 130px; background-color: rgb(255, 228, 225);\">&nbsp;the work of the non-professionals, the two groups can work productively together. </p></div><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\"><br></p></div></div><div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; padding: 0px 5px; border-top: 3px solid rgb(255, 165, 0); color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;\"><div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; text-align: right; margin-top: 10px;\"><br></div><div style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><h3 style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.1; color: inherit; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px;   font-size: 20px;\">Questions 9-13</h3><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\"><em style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Reading Passage 1 contains a number of opinions provided by four different scientists. Match each opinion (Questions <strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">9-13</strong>) with the scientists <strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">A-D</strong>.</span></em></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">NB</strong> <em style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">You may use any of the scientists <strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">A-D</strong> <span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">more than once</strong>.</span></em></span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\"><b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">9&nbsp;</b><select style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit; text-transform: none; border-radius: 3px;\"><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"\">&nbsp;</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"A\">A</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"B\">B</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"C\">C</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"D\">D</option></select></span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Amateur involvement can also be an instructive pastime.</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\"><b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">10&nbsp;</b><select style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit; text-transform: none; border-radius: 3px;\"><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"\">&nbsp;</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"A\">A</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"B\">B</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"C\">C</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"D\">D</option></select></span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Amateur scientists are prone to accidents.</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\"><b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">11&nbsp;</b><select style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit; text-transform: none; border-radius: 3px;\"><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"\">&nbsp;</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"A\">A</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"B\">B</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"C\">C</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"D\">D</option></select></span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Science does not belong to professional scientists alone.</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\"><b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">12&nbsp;</b><select style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit; text-transform: none; border-radius: 3px;\"><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"\">&nbsp;</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"A\">A</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"B\">B</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"C\">C</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"D\">D</option></select></span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">In certain areas of my work, people are a more valuable resource than technology.</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\"><b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">13&nbsp;</b><select style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit; text-transform: none; border-radius: 3px;\"><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"\">&nbsp;</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"A\">A</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"B\">B</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"C\">C</option><option style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\" value=\"D\">D</option></select></span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">It is important to give amateurs a name which reflects the value of their work.</span></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\">&nbsp;</p><div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; padding: 10px; border: 1px solid black;\"><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px; text-align: center;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">Name of&nbsp;scientists</strong></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">A.</strong> Dr Fienberg</p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">B.</strong> Adrian Hunt</p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">C.</strong> Rick Bonney</p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">D.</strong> Dr Carlson</p></div><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">Tip&nbsp;</strong></p><ul style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 10px;\"><li style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; Choose <span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">ONE or TWO WORDS</strong></span> from the passage for each answer.</span></em></p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\"><em style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 400;\">Write your answers in boxes <strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">1-8</strong> on your answer sheet.</span></em></p><div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; padding: 10px; border: 1px solid black;\"><h3 style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.1; color: inherit; margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px;   font-size: 20px; text-align: center;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">Summary</strong></h3><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\">Prior to the 19th century, professional <b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">1&nbsp;</b><input type=\"text\" required=\"\" readonly=\"\" value=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit;\"> did not exist and scientific research was largely carried out by amateurs. However, while <b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">2&nbsp;</b><input type=\"text\" required=\"\" readonly=\"\" value=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit;\"> today is mostly the domain of professionals, a recent US survey highlighted the fact that amateurs play an important role in at least seven <b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">3&nbsp;</b><input type=\"text\" required=\"\" readonly=\"\" value=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit;\"> and indeed many professionals are reliant on their <b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">4&nbsp;</b><input type=\"text\" required=\"\" readonly=\"\" value=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit;\">. In areas such as astronomy, amateurs can be invaluable when making specific <b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">5&nbsp;</b><input type=\"text\" required=\"\" readonly=\"\" value=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit;\"> on a global basis. Similarly in the area of palaeontology their involvement is invaluable and helpers are easy to recruit because of the popularity of <b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">6&nbsp;</b><input type=\"text\" required=\"\" readonly=\"\" value=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit;\">. Amateur birdwatchers also play an active role and their work has led to the establishment of a <b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">7&nbsp;</b><input type=\"text\" required=\"\" readonly=\"\" value=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit;\">. Occasionally the term &#39;amateur&#39; has been the source of disagreement and alternative names have been suggested but generally speaking, as long as the professional scientists <b style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: 700;\">8&nbsp;</b><input type=\"text\" required=\"\" readonly=\"\" value=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px; font: inherit; color: inherit;\">&nbsp;the work of the non-professionals, the two groups can work productively together. </p></div><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 10px;\"><br style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-weight: bold; color: red;\">Answer: scientists</span>&nbsp; &nbsp;</p><p  style=\"box-sizing: border-box;
